text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock If they miss the 100,000 target in fact, nobody should give a fig. Tests have gone up dramatically. The target was to get the MSM off his back for a while, who are now masturbating themselves off that their plan worked and they have their Gotcha.
